summary: This document appears to be a brief internal communication, likely an email, forwarding Lieutenant Rounds reports for August 9-10 from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York. It lists the computer terminals used to complete the rounds.

persons.name: Lt. Rounds
persons.context: The subject of the communication is the 'Lt. Rounds' reports for specific dates, indicating this individual is a Lieutenant responsible for security rounds at the correctional facility.

persons.name: Warden
persons.context: The communication is addressed to the Warden of the Metropolitan Correctional Center, forwarding the rounds reports.

connections.description: Lt. Rounds is submitting reports to the Warden, indicating a supervisory chain of command within the correctional facility.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is internal correspondence regarding security rounds at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
It specifies the dates August 9 and August 10, which are after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody at the MCC in 2019.
It lists specific computer terminals (279, 283, 236) used to log the completion of rounds, indicating a digital logging system.
